```{r echo=FALSE}

#' Format as abbrv in latex
format_abbrv <- function(entry) {
  authors <- vapply(entry$author, function(a) {
    # Names ending with * are equal contribution
    if (grepl("\\*$", a$given)) {
        paste0(a$family, " ", substr(a$given, 1, 1), ".\\*")
    } else {
        paste0(a$family, " ", substr(a$given, 1, 1), ".")
    }
  }, character(1))
  
  authors_str <- paste(authors, collapse = ", ")
  title <- entry$title
  journal <- entry$journal
  year <- entry$year
  note <- entry$note
  booktitle <- entry$booktitle
  pages <- entry$pages
  organization <- entry$organization

  if (length(journal) == 0) {
    # talks
    paste0(authors_str, ' (', year, '). "', title, '". ', note, '.\n')
  }
  else if (length(booktitle) == 0) {
    # journal articles
    paste0(authors_str, ' (', year, '). "', title, '". *', journal, '*. ', note, '.\n')
  } else {
    # proceedings
    paste0(authors_str, ' (', year, '). "', title, '". In *', booktitle, '*, ', pages, '. ', organization, '. ', note, '.\n')
  }
}

```

### List of publications and preprints

<small>(*Equal contribution)</small>

```{r echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
bib <- RefManageR::ReadBib("publication.bib")
formatted_entries <- sapply(bib, format_abbrv)
cat(paste(formatted_entries, collapse = "\n"))
```
